5#ifndef CYD_UI_VG_H
6#define CYD_UI_VG_H
7
8#include <vector>
9#include <variant>
10
11#include "vg_attributes.h"
12
13namespace cydui::graphics::vg {
14 struct vg_element_t {
15 int origin_x = 0;
16 int origin_y = 0;
17 void _internal_set_origin(int x, int y) {
18 origin_x = x;
19 origin_y = y;
20 }
21
22 virtual ~vg_element_t() = default;
23
24 virtual void apply_to(pixelmap_editor_t &editor) const = 0;
25
26 struct footprint {
27 int x, y, w, h;
28 };
29 virtual footprint get_footprint() const = 0;
30 };
31
32 struct vg_fragment_t {
33 std::vector<vg_element_t*> elements {};
34
35 ~vg_fragment_t() {
36 clear();
37 }
38
39 void clear() {
40 for (auto &item: elements) {
41 delete item;
42 }
43 elements.clear();
44 }
45
46 bool empty() const {
47 return elements.empty();
48 }
49
50 void append(std::initializer_list<vg_element_t*> _elements) {
51 for (const auto &item: _elements) {
52 elements.push_back(item);
53 }
54 }
55
56 template<typename ...T>
57 void append(T... _elements) {
58 static_assert((std::derived_from<T, vg_element_t> && ...), "Elements must derive from vg_element_t.");
59 (elements.push_back(new T {_elements}), ...);
60 }
61 };
62
63 template<typename ...T>
64 struct accepts_content {
65 accepts_content &with(std::vector<std::variant<T...>> _content_) {
66 this->content = _content_;
67 return *this;
68 }
69
70 std::vector<std::variant<T...>> content {};
71 };
72
73 // ? Basic Shapes
74 // * <pixel>
75 struct pixel:
76 vg_element_t,
77 attrs_core<pixel>,
78 attrs_fill<pixel>,
79 attr_x<pixel>,
80 attr_y<pixel> {
81 pixel() = default;
82
83 void apply_to(pixelmap_editor_t &editor) const override {
84 auto lg = Cairo::LinearGradient::create(0, 0, 1, 1);
85
86 if (origin_x + _x < editor.img.width() && origin_y + _y < editor.img.height()) {
87 auto clr = sample_fill(_x, _y);
88 editor.img.set({(unsigned int) origin_x + _x, (unsigned int) origin_y + _y}, {
89 (u8) (clr.b * 255),
90 (u8) (clr.g * 255),
91 (u8) (clr.r * 255),
92 (u8) (clr.a * _fill_opacity * 255)
93 });
94 }
95 }
96
97 footprint get_footprint() const override {
98 return {_x, _y, 1, 1};
99 }
100 };
101
102 // * <line>
103 struct line:
104 vg_element_t,
105 attrs_core<line>,
106 attrs_stroke<line>,
107 attr_x1<line>,
108 attr_y1<line>,
109 attr_x2<line>,
110 attr_y2<line> {
111 line() {
112 // per element Defaults
113 this->stroke_width(1);
114 }
115
116 void apply_to(pixelmap_editor_t &editor) const override {
117 apply_stroke(editor);
118
119 set_source_to_stroke(editor);
120
121 editor->move_to(origin_x + _x1, origin_y + _y1);
122 editor->line_to(origin_x + _x2, origin_y + _y2);
123
124 editor->stroke();
125 }
126
127 footprint get_footprint() const override {
128 return {
129 std::min(_x1, _x2),
130 std::min(_y1, _y2),
131 std::abs(_x2 - _x1),
132 std::abs(_y2 - _y1),
133 };
134 }
135 };
136
137 // * <polygon>
138 struct polygon:
139 vg_element_t,
140 attrs_core<polygon>,
141 attrs_fill<polygon>,
142 attrs_stroke<polygon>,
143 attr_points<polygon> {
144 void apply_to(pixelmap_editor_t &editor) const override {
145 apply_stroke(editor);
146 apply_fill(editor);
147
148 bool first = true;
149 for (const auto &p: _points) {
150 if (first) {
151 editor->move_to(origin_x + p[0], origin_y + p[1]);
152 first = false;
153 } else {
154 editor->line_to(origin_x + p[0], origin_y + p[1]);
155 }
156 }
157 // Close the polygon
158 editor->close_path();
159
160 set_source_to_stroke(editor);
161 editor->stroke_preserve();
162
163 set_source_to_fill(editor);
164 editor->fill();
165 }
166
167 footprint get_footprint() const override {
168 if (_points.empty()) {
169 return {0, 0, 0, 0};
170 }
171
172 int min_x = _points[0][0];
173 int min_y = _points[0][1];
174 int max_x = _points[0][0];
175 int max_y = _points[0][1];
176 int x, y;
177 for (std::size_t i = 1; i < _points.size(); ++i) {
178 x = _points[i][0];
179 y = _points[i][1];
180 if (x < min_x) min_x = x;
181 if (x > max_x) max_x = x;
182 if (y < min_y) min_y = y;
183 if (y > max_y) max_y = y;
184 }
185 return {
186 min_x,
187 min_y,
188 max_x - min_x,
189 max_y - min_y,
190 };
191 }
192 };
193
194 // * <polyline>
195 struct polyline:
196 vg_element_t,
197 attrs_core<polyline>,
198 attrs_fill<polyline>,
199 attrs_stroke<polyline>,
200 attr_points<polyline> {
201 void apply_to(pixelmap_editor_t &editor) const override {
202 apply_stroke(editor);
203 apply_fill(editor);
204
205 bool first = true;
206 for (const auto &p: _points) {
207 if (first) {
208 editor->move_to(origin_x + p[0], origin_y + p[1]);
209 first = false;
210 } else {
211 editor->line_to(origin_x + p[0], origin_y + p[1]);
212 }
213 }
214
215 set_source_to_stroke(editor);
216 editor->stroke_preserve();
217
218 set_source_to_fill(editor);
219 editor->fill();
220 }
221
222 footprint get_footprint() const override {
223 if (_points.empty()) {
224 return {0, 0, 0, 0};
225 }
226
227 int min_x = _points[0][0];
228 int min_y = _points[0][1];
229 int max_x = _points[0][0];
230 int max_y = _points[0][1];
231 int x, y;
232 for (std::size_t i = 1; i < _points.size(); ++i) {
233 x = _points[i][0];
234 y = _points[i][1];
235 if (x < min_x) min_x = x;
236 if (x > max_x) max_x = x;
237 if (y < min_y) min_y = y;
238 if (y > max_y) max_y = y;
239 }
240 return {
241 min_x,
242 min_y,
243 max_x - min_x,
244 max_y - min_y,
245 };
246 }
247 };

251 vg_element_t,
252 attrs_core<path>,
253 attrs_fill<path>,
254 attrs_stroke<path>,
255 attr_path_str<path> {
256 void apply_to(pixelmap_editor_t &editor) const override {
257 apply_stroke(editor);
258 apply_fill(editor);
259
260 }
261
262 footprint get_footprint() const override {
263 return {};
264 }
265 };

267 // * <rect>
268 struct rect:
269 vg_element_t,
270 attrs_core<rect>,
271 attrs_fill<rect>,
272 attrs_stroke<rect>,
273 attr_x<rect>,
274 attr_y<rect>,
275 attr_w<rect>,
276 attr_h<rect>,
277 attr_rx<rect>,
278 attr_ry<rect> {
279 void apply_to(pixelmap_editor_t &editor) const override {
280 apply_stroke(editor);
281 apply_fill(editor);
282
283 // Replace with a proper path construction that takes into account
284 // _rx and _ry
285 if (_rx == 0 && _ry == 0) {
286 editor->rectangle(origin_x + _x, origin_y + _y, _w, _h);
287 if (_stroke_width > 0) {
288 set_source_to_stroke(editor);
289 editor->stroke_preserve();
290 }
291
292 set_source_to_fill(editor);
293 editor->fill();
294 } else {
295 //editor->rectangle(
296 // _x + _rx,
297 // _y,
298 // _width - _rx * 2,
299 // _height
300 //);
301 //editor->rectangle(
302 // _x,
303 // _y + _ry,
304 // _rx,
305 // _height - _ry * 2
306 //);
307 //editor->rectangle(
308 // _width - _rx,
309 // _y + _ry,
310 // _rx,
311 // _height - _ry * 2
312 //);
313 }
314 }
315
316 footprint get_footprint() const override {
317 return {_x, _y, _w, _h};
318 }
319 };
320
321 // * <circle>
322 struct circle:
323 vg_element_t,
324 attrs_core<circle>,
325 attrs_fill<circle>,
326 attrs_stroke<circle>,
327 attr_cx<circle>,
328 attr_cy<circle>,
329 attr_r<circle> {
330 void apply_to(pixelmap_editor_t &editor) const override {
331 apply_stroke(editor);
332 apply_fill(editor);
333
334 editor->arc(origin_x + _cx, origin_y + _cy, _r, 0, 2 * M_PI);
335 set_source_to_stroke(editor);
336 editor->stroke_preserve();
337
338 set_source_to_fill(editor);
339 editor->fill();
340 }
341
342 footprint get_footprint() const override {
343 return {_cx - _r, _cy - _r, 2 * _r, 2 * _r};
344 }
345 };
346
347 // * <ellipse>
348 struct ellipse:
349 vg_element_t,
350 attrs_core<ellipse>,
351 attrs_fill<ellipse>,
352 attrs_stroke<ellipse>,
353 attr_cx<ellipse>,
354 attr_cy<ellipse>,
355 attr_rx<ellipse>,
356 attr_ry<ellipse> {
357 void apply_to(pixelmap_editor_t &editor) const override {
358 apply_stroke(editor);
359 apply_fill(editor);
360
361 editor->save();
362 editor->translate(origin_x + _cx, origin_y + _cy);
363 editor->scale(_rx, _ry);
364 editor->arc(0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0, 2 * M_PI);
365
366 set_source_to_stroke(editor);
367 editor->stroke_preserve();
368
369 set_source_to_fill(editor);
370 editor->fill();
371
372 editor->restore();
373 }
374
375 footprint get_footprint() const override {
376 return {};
377 }
378 };
379

385 attrs_core<group>,
386 attrs_fill<ellipse>,
387 attrs_stroke<ellipse>,
388 accepts_content<line> {
389 void apply_to(pixelmap_editor_t &editor) const override {
390 apply_stroke(editor);
391 }
392
393 footprint get_footprint() const override {
394 return {};
395 }
396 };

398 // ? Text
399 // * <text>
400 struct text:
401 vg_element_t,
402 attrs_core<text>,
403 attrs_fill<text>,
404 //attrs_stroke<text>,
405 attrs_font<text>,
406 attr_x<text>,
407 attr_y<text>,
408 attr_w<text>,
409 attr_h<text> {
410 std::string _text;
411 text(std::string _text): _text(std::move(_text)) { }
412 void apply_to(pixelmap_editor_t &editor) const override {
413 apply_font(editor);
414 //apply_stroke(editor);
415 apply_fill(editor);
416
417 Cairo::FontExtents fextents;
418 editor->get_font_extents(fextents);
419
420 Cairo::TextExtents extents;
421 editor->get_text_extents(_text, extents);
422
423
424 set_source_to_fill(editor);
425 editor->move_to(origin_x + _x, origin_y + _y);
426 editor->show_text(_text);
427 //editor->move_to(origin_x + _x, origin_y + _y + fextents.ascent);
428 //editor->show_text(_text);
429 //editor->move_to(origin_x + _x + 5, origin_y + _y + fextents.height);
430 //editor->show_text(_text);
431 //editor->move_to(origin_x + _x + 10, origin_y + _y + extents.height);
432 //editor->show_text(_text);
433 }
434
435 footprint get_footprint() const override {
436 return {};
437 }
438 };
